subject: Football
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre was released from the reserve-retired list by the Jets on Tuesday night, making the quarterback a free agent if he decides to again come out of retirement. When Favre was dealt to the Jets from Green Bay in August, there were conditions in the trade that required the Packers to be compensated if the Jets moved him. Those no longer apply if he signs elsewhere.
